comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Miss Tiria Townshend, age 17, of Blenheim, New Zealand, possibly the only New Zealander survivor of the Empress of Ireland sinking: paperspast.natlib.govt.nz/cgi-bin/paperspast?a=d&d=EP... www.sea-viewdiving.com/shipwreck_info/empress_home/whitst...

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: pennylrichardsca: Thank you for the additional information on this survivor of the sinking of the Empress of Ireland. We will add her fuller name to the description when we update.
